scripts.docs: typedoc --out ../fs-pro-docs/website && cd ../fs-pro-docs && node minify && curl http://fs-pro-docs.herokuapp.com/record.json > record.json && git add . && git commit -a -m "new version" && git push origin master
scripts.build: webpack && dts-bundle --configJson dts-bundle.json && rimraf types && cd plugins && tsc *.ts --target es5
scripts.git: git add . && git commit -a -m "new version" && git push origin master
scripts.cpublish: yarn build && yarn test && yarn lint dist/*.d.ts --fix && yarn docs && yarn publish
